Lunarpine laughed as the bot made his demands. "Wait just a minute and let
me get this straight, you called us in here, set all kinds of traps to keep
us away, injure yourself to draw us back in, then set a bomb that will
destroy us all if we don't let you go just so you can walk, um I mean limp
out of here without a confrontation?" The wolfbot stood mildly amused by
Grizzlotrons amazing lack of logic (Must be Predacon.) "This could all have
been avoided if you would have come out and heard what we had to offer in
the first place." He stepped aside allowing plenty of room for the other bot
to pass "We'd have offered you a place to stay and get your functions
straight while teaching you about us, after that you'd have the option of
staying or going." He was rambling and he knew it.

On the opposite side of the debris a psionic push pushed rocks and dirt away
from a dirtcovered polar bear. Ice transformed to her owl form and flew out
of the cave and around to the other side where Lunarpine had made an
entrance.
----- Original Message -----
From: Beast Wars <beastwars@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 13, 2001 5:03 PM
Subject: Re: Say Welcome to Grizzltron


OOC:Sorry that i been gone these past days in another room.....
Sinister Plan???You accutally think I made one up????


�Grizzltron�


    "Shut up while I Divulge my Sinister Plan. (Now I got to think of
One..Ohhh I got One.) I have a Bomb that will blow this mountain sky
high(That's a lie), If you don't let me go I will blow us up and there will
be no tommorow for us three.
